name: Gigamart Inventory Batch
description: Batch ingestion of inventory CSV snapshots from GCS to BigQuery raw layer (giga_raw.raw_inventory_snapshots).

parameters.name: input_pattern
parameters.label: Input GCS pattern
parameters.helpText: GCS file pattern for inventory snapshots (e.g. gs://<bucket>/inventory/*.csv)

parameters.name: output_table
parameters.label: Output table
parameters.helpText: BigQuery table for raw inventory snapshots (e.g. <project>:giga_raw.raw_inventory_snapshots)

parameters.name: dead_letter_table
parameters.label: Dead-letter table
parameters.helpText: Optional BigQuery table for failed inventory records (e.g. <project>:giga_raw.raw_inventory_snapshots_dlq). If not set, errors are only logged.
